column1: You may have seen your doctor because you've had benign positional vertigo.
BPPV is the most common cause of vertigo and the easiest to treat.
Most of the time, treatment will cure BPPV.
Your doctor may prescribe medicines that can help relieve spinning sensations.
However, these medicines often do not work well for treating vertigo.
A physical therapist may be able to teach you other exercises to reduce your symptoms.
